name: Interesting Decisions
description:
Mouse looks / WASD or Arrows move / Spacebar jumps

Enter a neon, retro cyberspace where you collect "power" to move faster and jump higher.

This is the standalone version of a piece written for the 2016 Kyma International Sound Symposium. The original version sends messages out from the game into a dedicated hardware processor for live generative audio. This standalone version uses the game's internal sound engine, with simplified audio and graphics.
